attributes.description: This dashboard shows Incidents collected by the IRONSCALES Integration.

params.markdown:
This dashboard provides centralized visibility into incidents detected by IRONSCALES.

It features a control panel that displays incident classification and type, with key metrics highlighting the total affected mailboxes and total incidents to provide a quick overview of the incident landscape. Incident trends are visualized through a pie chart for classification and sender reputation, and a bar chart for incident types. Detailed insights are provided through tables showing the top recipient emails, recipient names, assignees, sender emails, and sender names. For deeper investigation, saved searches deliver detailed incident reports and incident attachment details. Together, these visualizations enable both high-level monitoring and actionable insights to support efficient incident analysis and response.

**[Integration Page](/app/integrations/detail/ironscales)**

attributes.title: [Logs IRONSCALES] Incident
